body.name: Paula's Choice Skin Balancing Pore-Reducing Toner for Combination and Oily Skin, Minimizes Large Pores, 6.4 Fluid Ounce Bottle
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 33 mins
features: MINIMIZE PORES AND ENHANCE THE YOUTHFUL APPEARANCE of your skin with our Skin Balancing Pore-Reducing Toner. Fight the effects of aging, reduce blackheads, and shrink pores, for smooth, unblemished skin. A great addition to your day or night routine. PACKAGING MAY VARY.

Contains antioxidants and hydrating ceramides, making oily areas less noticeable and skin more even. This toner is specially formulated for use with oily skin, combination skin, enlarged pores, blemish-prone skin to balance, refine, and protect your skin.

Our SKIN BALANCING Pore-Reducing Toner with Antioxidants balances oily, combination, and blemish-prone skin. Use day & night after your favorite Paula's Choice cleanser to remove the last traces of makeup, clear pores, & renew skin before moisturizing.

Paula's Choice products are made with YOUR SKIN in mind. Whether your skin is dry, oily, combination, aging, acne or blemish-prone, sensitive, or dull; we've got a skincare solution for you. The search for amazing skincare ends here. Finally, you found it.
SUSTAINABLE PACKAGING: As part of our pledge to the planet, we’re removing extra plastic from packaging, like shrink wrap.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, science-backed formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This toner is great for a mild sweep after cleansing. It helps to hydrate the skin as well as slough off some of the dryness that I have. I really like to use the polish choice line. They seem to have everything that your skin needs to feel clean and toned. I would definitely recommend this, especially if you have sensitive skin. I didn’t have any issues with breakout or drying after using this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to wait to review this item until I had been using for 4+ weeks. This toner has decreased texture in my skin (T-Zone Area) which is where i struggle most. I use twice a day after washing my face. It is hydrating but soft. I have noticed a significant decrease in my blackheads on my nose and chin. Will absolutely purchase this again once I'm out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Listen, I’ve only used this twice….and call me crazy but I can already tell a difference???? I can’t wait to see how my skin looks after a month. I’m sad it took me so long to finally try this and the exfoliant! Don’t be like me and take forever to decide. BUY THIS RIGHT NOW.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works for my oily skin
reviews.reviewText: I have pretty oily skin and some enlarged pores . Could tell. A huge difference within such a short period of time ( 10 days) I use forsure daily and sometimes twice if I remember def only thing OTC that has helped with pores

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this because it was the most popular on lists of products that were safe for pregnancy. Before this I was using a product called blackhead power liquid and that worked pretty good. It kept my pores looking small. However I always had redness. I have a few hairs I have to tweeze above my lip pretty much everyday (hormonal stuff) and no matter how many hours pass it's always kind of red and there's always hyperpigmentation where I plucked. Well to my delight, Paula's choice toner takes care of the hyperpigmentation. I'll never go back. It's been amazing having smaller pores AND not having to deal with hyperpigmentation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for reducing look of pores
reviews.reviewText: My skin after using for a month looks great . It looks and feels smoother . Even brighter . I have sensitive skin and no harsh side effects . No strong smell . Can use everyday .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Havent really used this yet
reviews.reviewText: Smells nice, but is still in package. I havent had a chance to use it yet....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toner for combination skin!
reviews.reviewText: Here is a picture of what I use for my face which is both oily and dry. It has been hard finding the right face products for my skin. A lot of times it would clog my large pores, or I would have white heads along with dry/ red blotchy skin. Then I researched some of Paula’s Choice products. I picked out what I thought fit my type of skin. After some adjusting my skin has been the best it has ever been. I don’t have big blackheads, white heads, dry skin, or red blotches. And it feels great. In the morning I use the face wash, eye cream, and the daily hydrating fluid lotion. At night I use the face wash, the toner (make sure you let your face completely dry afterwards before moving on), I use 3 drops of the boost (let that dry), then I put on the night oil free moisturizer.Every Tuesday night I use the exfoliate instead of the toner. You let it dry completely. It takes about 15 minutes. I usually don’t put anything on after using the exfoliate because I am too tired to wait for it to dry. It works for me.Then about once a month or every two weeks on a Friday night, after using the toner, I use exfoliate rinse off treatment. Afterwards I finish with the boost and night moisturizer.I highly recommend this brand.

I love all of Paula’s choice products. I’m 54 and still have acne, as well as wrinkles and developing brown spots 🙄. I was in Acutane in my 20’s and now have some basil cell cancer on my nose so my face is a full conundrum as to which products to use over the years. I gave her products a try a few years ago and love everything, I just wish Amazon sold her whole line of products. I would highly recommend any product for any skin type!
This toner have been my constant from 2021 and I have not gotten back to any toners so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 13, 2019
reviews.reviewText: So far it's been really nice on my skin. I can tell my skin is clearer and less red. I have dry to normal skin, but it is oily around my nose, so I bought this one. I don't have large pores anyway but they are definitely less noticable. My skin just feels healthier and looks glowly, like I'm wearing a thin coverage makeup.
